function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for inadequate review of Covid-19 impacts leading to misinformation and ineffective policies","Impact":"Misinformed policies and public health strategies, leading to increased spread and impact of Covid-19","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough and reliable review processes with input from diverse experts and stakeholders","Technologies":"AI-driven data analysis and review platforms, collaborative research tools","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Shift from traditional intellectual engagement to quick, 'what works' strategies","Impact":"Loss of critical analysis and identification of knowledge gaps, potential for oversimplification and inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Promote a balance between traditional intellectual craftsmanship and efficient synthesis of research, emphasize the importance of critical thinking in evaluating literature","Technologies":"AI-assisted literature analysis tools, academic training programs","People":"Academic researchers, scholars, knowledge exchange professionals","Owner":"Universities, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Rapid reporting on a wide range of research papers with limited rigor and depth","Impact":"Dissemination of incomplete or biased information, lack of comprehensive understanding of research findings","Mitigation":"Implement thorough peer review processes, incorporate multiple perspectives, and emphasize transparency in reporting limitations","Technologies":"Peer review platforms, collaborative research tools, automated quality assessment algorithms","People":"Researchers, reviewers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"}]}
